Track your time, create reports, and easily manage your employees' work with Sandtime.io (https://sandtime.io).

This companion Chrome extension brings the full Sandtime.io time tracking experience right under your fingertips - without ever leaving a browser and needless context switches.

Manage your team's time and boost productivity with Sandtime.io! This time tracking app, created by a manager for managers, simplifies small and medium-sized enterprise management. With a one-click start/stop timer or manual timesheets, you can easily track hours worked and view team data right from the system tray. Sandtime.io even allows automatic time registration at startup and shutdown, so you can forget about time entries and focus on your projects. Easily prepare invoices and reports using data collected by you. Monitor your team's performance, optimize your organization's effectiveness, and support multiple currencies with features like:

• Timesheets
• Reporting
• Project management
• Team access controls
• Time rounding
• Multi-currency support
• Temporal cost and revenue rates
• Custom subdomain
• Browser extension
• Slack integration

Streamline your workflow and increase productivity today with Sandtime.io!
